name: Tunnel & Toil
description: Tyler Parkinson is a student and aspiring artist/ game developer at Auckland Media Design School. His artworks throughout his high-school years earned him the award for NCEA level 3, top academic creative arts student. A nerd, a gamer, and a lover of the arts, when he isn’t working on artworks, game projects or university assignments, he is gaming or prepping for his next dungeons & dragons session.
